  • Packages that use XmlBean 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context
    Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the context framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di
    Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the DI framework.

      class  XmlAspect
      Encapsulates the notion of an "aspect", which consists of a name or ID, a class, and optional properties, as defined in XML.
